ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.context: root/document[0]/metadata[0](12 0 obj PDMetadata)/XMPPackage[0]
checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: If Lbl structure elements are present, the ListNumbering attribute shall be present on the respective L structure element; in such cases the value None shall not be used

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](84 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[3](285 0 obj SEPart Part)/K[1](283 0 obj SESect Sect)/K[2](287 0 obj SEL L)
checks.errorMessage: List items contain Lbl structure elements, but the ListNumbering attribute is not present on the respective L structure element or it has value None

ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child, as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, Annex L and ISO/TS 32005

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](84 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)
checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains P,Figure,H3,P,Sect,Sect,H3,Sect,H3,L,P,Table,Sect,Sect element(s) instead of a single Document structure element

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](84 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[4](154 0 obj SEPart Part)/K[1](155 0 obj SEL L)

ruleSummaries.description: A Figure structure element shall have at least one of the following properties: a) an alternate description (Alt property), as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3; b) a replacement text (ActualText property) that represents the content enclosed by the Figure structure element

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](84 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[1](356 0 obj SEFigure Figure)
checks.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text
